title: Why Medicare Surcharges Can Shock Retirees
sub_head: Also in this month’s Ask Encore: Answering a reader’s question about qualified charitable distributions
body:
I would like to see you write, and warn your readers, about Medicare surcharges. I was insufficiently aware of the impacts. Perhaps you can cushion the shock for others.
“Shock,” often, is the right word. And tax season is a good time to address this.
